SEARCH

Class VendingMachine

java.lang.Object
VendingMachine
public class VendingMachine extends Object
Contains all menu-calling and file management methods. Is central to the operations and functionality of the whole vending machine program.

      public void displayMenu(VendingMachine vm, Scanner s) throws FileNotFoundException
      Displays the main menu of the Vending Machine and repeatedly gets user input. Makes the necessary method calls to perform specific sub-tasks.
      Parameters:
      vm - The Vending Machine being operated on
      s - The active scanner object
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the needed file does not exist in this directory
